jobTitle: Audit Manager II - Data Analytics Manager
jobDescription: The Data Analytics (DA) Audit Team is a newly created team within the Audit Services Department. This highly visible position will be responsible for developing the plan to implement the Audit Services' data analytics strategy. The DA Audit Team will be a centralized unit within Audit Services with a physical presence in Chicago and India and supports the global Audit Services Department. The DA Audit Team Manager will oversee the development of the function with a focus on hiring highly talented individuals; collaborating with Audit Services Leadership to increase utilization and conduct impactful analytics supporting testing, risk assessments, and other reporting; and engaging with the corporate Northern Trust Data Analytics Team to leverage their experience, tools, and knowledge. The DA Audit Team Manager will also ensure the acquisition, development, and retention of diverse talent, leveraging innovative strategies to attract and retain top talent and build a high-performing team. The DA Audit Team Manager will also conduct the performance management process, identify training and development needs, and establish performance standards for the function.
